name: Run Rupert Run...! - C64 game
description:
RUN RUPERT RUN...!

(seuck game) year VOX VODEOGAME & Co. 2020

... Run Rupert Run ...! "cyborg chick against the stepdaughters  of a mad scientist "Mandy  &   Mara". the two bad sisters have genetically modified chickens and created strange and dangerous animals to succeed in their intent that is, (to conquer the world), using the invented machine of their father ... yours the task will be to stop this madness and save the poor guinea pigs from their disappearance ... " ... game design, graphics and sound effects by Pinov Vox, using The S.E.U.C.K. " Shoot 'Em Up Construction Kit by Sensible Software 1987 ... a vertical scrolling game made in year 2020...by Vox Videogame & Co. with special thanks to TNd64 "The New Dimension 64" for additional help ...   front end code, enhancements and music  by  Richard Bayliss ...   bring your joystick in Port2 or port1...use left/right on your joystick to select in game sound option ...   pressing fire will commence play ...   ...  your mission is to rescue the poor guinea pigs and face: chickens with explosive eggs, modified little dragons, diabolical bubbles and other devilry created by the "crazy sisters" ... locate the machine of the laboratory, stop the terrible and bad girls. .. and save the little animals from certain death ... and save the world........bring your Joystick...in Port2           single player game ...   * joystick port 2 or port 1 to enter the name in the high score list, if you are using port1 you must use port2 to enter your record             ... have fun ...!

Pino Vox
